Verses: 1 oruvan Oru Maattaiyaavadhu Oru Aattaiyaavadhu Thirudi, Adhaik Kondraal, Alladhu Adhai Vitraal, Avan Andha Maattukku Aindhu Maadugalaiyum, Andha Aattukku Naalu Aadugalaiyum Padhilaagak Kodukkakkadavan.
2 thirudan Kannamidugaiyil Kandupidikkappattu, Adikkappattuch Seththaal, Avan Nimiththam Raththappazhi Sumaraadhu.

3 sooriyan Avanmel Udhiththirundhadhaanaal, Avan Nimiththam Raththappazhi Sumarum; Thirudan Padhil Koduththuth Theerkkavendum; Avan Kaiyil Ondrum Illaadhirundhaal, Thaan Seydha Kalavukkaaga Vilaippadakkadavan.
4 avan Thirudina Maadaavadhu Kazhudhaiyaavadhu Aadaavadhu Uyirudane Avan Kaiyil Kandupidikkappattaal, Irattippaai Avan Kodukkavendum.

5 oruvan Piranudaiya Vayalilaavadhu Thiraatchaththottaththilaavadhu Than Mirugajeevanai Meyavittaal, Avan Than Suyavayalilum Thiraatchaththottaththilumulla Palanil Uththamamaanadhai Eduththu, Padhil Seluththakkadavan.

6 akkini Ezhumbi, Mullukalil Patri, Thaaniyapporaiyaavadhu, Vilaindha Payiraiyaavadhu, Vayalilulla Vere Edhaiyaavadhu Eriththuppottadheyaanaal, Akkiniyaik Koluththinavan Akkinich Sedhaththirku Uththaravaadham Pannavendum.

7 oruvan Piranudaiya Vasaththil Thiraviyaththaiyaavadhu, Udaimaigalaiyaavadhu Adaikkalamaaga Vaiththirukkumpodhu, Adhu Avan Veettilirundhu Thirudappattupponaal, Thirudan Agappattaanaagil, Avan Adharku Rattippaagak Kodukkavendum.
8 thirudan Agappadaadheponaal, Andha Veettukkaaran Thaane Piranudaiya Porulai Abagariththaano Illaiyo Endru Ariyumbadi Niyaayaadhibadhigalidaththil Avanaik Kondupoga Vendum.

9 kaanaamalpona Maadu, Kazhudhai, Aadu, Vasthiram Mudhaliyavaigalil Yaadhondraip Piranoruvan Thannudaiyadhu Endru Solli Kutranjaatrinaal, Irudhiraththaarudaiya Vazhakkum Niyaayaadhipadhigalidaththil Varakkadavadhu; Niyaayaadhibadhigal Evanaik Kutravaali Endru Theerkkiraargalo, Avan Matravanukku Rattippaagak Kodukkakkadavan.

10 oruvan Than Kazhudhaiyaiyaavadhu Maattaiyaavadhu Aattaiyaavadhu Matra Yaadhoru Mirugajeevanaiyaavadhu Piran Vasaththil Vittirukkumbodhu Adhu Seththaalum, Sedhappattupponaalum, Oruvarum Kaanaadhabadi Ottikkondu Pogappattaalum,

11 avan Thaan Piranudaiya Porulai Abagarikkavillaiyendru Karththar Peril Idum Aanai Avargal Iruvarukkum Naduththeerkkakkadavadhu; Udaiyavan Adhai Angeegarikkavendum; Matravan Badhilalikkavenduvadhillai.
12 adhu Avan Vasaththilirundhu Thirudappattuppoyitraanaal, Avan Adhin Ejamaanukku Adharkaaga Uththaravaadham Pannakkadavan.
13 adhu Peerundupoyitraanaal, Adharkuch Saatchiyai Oppuvikkavendum. Peerundadharkaaga Avan Uththaravaadham Pannavenduvadhillai.
14 oruvan Piranidaththil Edhaiyaagilum Iravalaaga Vaanginadhundaanaal, Adharku Udaiyavankooda Iraadhapodhu, Adhu Sedhappattaalum, Seththupponaalum, Avan Adharku Uththaravaadham Pannavendum.
15 adharku Udaiyavankooda Irundhaanaagil, Avan Uththaravaadham Pannavenduvadhillai; Adhu Vaadagaikku Vaangappattirundhaal, Adhu Avan Vaadagaikku Vandha Sedham.
16 niyamikkappadaadha Oru Kannigaiyai Oruvan Mosampokki Avalode Sayaniththaal, Avan Avalukkaagap Parisamkoduththu, Avalai Vivaagampannakkadavan.
17 aval Thagappan Avalai Avanukkuk Kodukkamaatten Endraanaagil, Kannigaigalukkaagak Kodukkappadum Parisa Muraimaiyinbadi Avan Panaththai Niruththuk Kodukkavendum.
18 sooniyakkaariyai Uyirode Vaikka Vendaam.
19 mirugaththode Punarugiravan Evanum Kollappadavendum.
20 karththar Oruvarukke Ozhiya Vere Dhevargalukkup Baliyidugiravan Sangarikkappadakkadavan.
21 anniyanaich Sirumaippaduththaamalum Odukkaamalum Iruppeergalaaga; Neengalum Egipthu Dhesaththil Anniyargalaayirundheergale.
22 vidhavaiyaiyum Thikkatra Pillaiyaiyum Odukkaamal Iruppeergalaaga;
23 avargalai Evvalavaagilum Odukkumpodhu, Avargal Ennai Nokki Muraiyittaal, Avargal Muraiyidudhalai Naan Nichchayamaaik Kettu,
24 kobamoondavaraagi, Ungalaip Pattayaththinaal Kolaiseyven; Ungal Manaivigal Vidhavaigalum, Ungal Pillaigal Thikkatra Pillaigalumaavaargal.
25 ungalukkul Sirumaippattirukkira En Janangalil Oruvanukku Neengal Panam Kadanaagak Koduththirundhaal, Vattivaangugiravargalpola Avanidaththil Vatti Vaangavendaam.
26 piranudaiya Vasthiraththai Eedaaga Vaanginaal, Pozhudhupogumunname Adhai Avanukkuth Thirumbak Koduththu Viduvaayaaga.

27 avan Porvai Adhudhaane, Adhuve Avan Than Udambai Moodikkollugira Vasthiram; Veru Edhinaale Porththup Paduththukkolluvaan? Avan Ennai Nokki Muraiyidumpodhu, Naan Avanukkuch Sevikoduppen, Naan Irakkamullavaraayirukkiren.
28 niyaayaadhibadhigalaith Dhooshiyaamalum, Un Janaththin Adhibadhiyaich Sabiyaamalum Iruppaayaaga.
29 mudhal Mudhal Pazhukkum Un Pazhaththaiyum, Vadiyum Un Rasaththaiyum Kaanikkaiyaagach Seluththath Thaamadhikka Vendaam. Un Kumaararil Mudhalperaanavanai Enakkuk Koduppaayaaga.
30 un Maadugalilum Un Aadugalilum Appadiye Seyvaayaaga; Kuttiyaanadhu Ezhunaal Than Thaayode Irukkattum, Ettaam Naalile Adhai Enakkuch Cheluththuvaayaaga.
31 neengal Enakkup Parisuththa Manusharaayirukkakkadaveergal; Veliyile Peerunda Maamsaththaip Pusiyaamal, Adhai Naaigalukkup Pottuvidungal.
